entry.title: $2567 // Incredible 2 Bed/2 Bath in Heart of Bushwick! Ridgewood Border!
entry.content:
Incredible 2 bedroom/ 2 full bath apartment in fantastic Bushwick location!
** Tucked away off Wyckoff Avenue in a quiet, well maintained building just steps from amazing restaurants, coffee shops, shopping and transportation, apartmeant features beautiful new updates and renovations along with original details and charm!
-- Exposed brick lining the living room and both bedrooms - bedrooms at opposite ends with beautiful windows and deep closets, each with overhead storage as well!
-- High ceilings featuring skylights in the living room!
-- Beautiful tiled kitchen with brand new appliances including a dishwasher! 2 beautiful gut renovated bathrooms (one on each end of the apartment).

â€‹Apartment is NO BROKER FEE - Call or Text Oliver at 212-961*66.67 to view
